7 // This file defines an API used to indicate fatal error conditions. Non-fatal
8 // errors (most of them) should be handled through Phaeton Context.
9 //
10 //===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//

18 #include <iostream>

20 #define INTERNAL_ERROR FRED("internal error: ")
21 #define SYNTAX_ERROR FRED("syntax error: ")
22 #define SEMANTIC_ERROR FRED("semantic error: ")
23 
24 namespace ph {
25 
34 PH_ATTRIBUTE_NORETURN static void
35 ph_unreachable_internal(const char *msg = nullptr, const char *file = nullptr,
36  unsigned line = 0) {
37  if (msg)
38  std::cerr << msg << "\n";
39  std::cerr << "UNREACHABLE executed";
40  if (file)
41  std::cerr << " at " << file << ":" << line;
42  std::cerr << "!\n";
43  abort();
44 }
45 
46 } // end namespace ph
47 
55 #ifndef NDEBUG
56 #define ph_unreachable(msg) \
57  ::ph::ph_unreachable_internal(msg, __FILE__, __LINE__)
58 #else
59 #define ph_unreachable(msg) ::ph::ph_unreachable_internal(msg)
60 #endif
61 
62 #endif // PHAETON_SUPPORT_ERROR_HANDLING_H
